item.description:
Maine permaculture friends ... Please join us for a fund-raising benefit concert to support Charles & Julia Yelton's International Permaculture Living and Learning Center at Villa Francesca in Sicily!

EMBRACE will feature Inanna: Sisters in Rhythm, Charles & Julia Yelton, Andrea Goodman, Rick Cormier, All of You, the World Oneness Community. Tickets are $25 and each ticket entitles you to an opportunity to be selected in any of the drawings (below). For instance, two entry fees gives you two opportunities! Bring percussion instruments and vocal cords.

You can certainly RSVP here to let people know you're going but you must purchase your ticket online here!

Prizes for the Drawing Include:

  • A two-week Permaculture Design Course in Sicily including “Drumming the Divine” with members of Inanna. This will also include excursions to sacred goddess sites. March 15-27. (Value $1400) Airfare not included.
  • A two-week deep ecology course in Sicily: Beyond Permaculture, a journey through our evolution to the depths of self and the birthing of our new story for the Ecozoic era. Retracing mythology, rights of passage, and ritual. May 2011 (Value $1400) Airfare not included
  • A two-week holiday accommodation for two in an authentic stone cottage at Villa Francesca in Cangemi, Sicily, TBA in 2011 (Value $1100 ) Airfare not included
  • An original painting by renowned local artist Nancy Earle titled Dancing Forms. (Value $500.)
  • An original piece of Spiritwear by Lizzy Derecktor titled Balance (Value $250)
  • Three dimensional Goddess plaque by Julia Yelton ($80 Value)

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: EMBRACE: Responding to the Call of Madre Dea
